2577.name: ACCOUNT_ID_PASSWORD_SAME
2577.message:
You cannot use a password that is
identical to your Nintendo Network ID.

Please use a different password
2577.short_description: Your username and password are the same.
2577.long_description: Your username and password are the same.
2577.short_solution: Change either your username or password.
2577.long_solution: Change either your username or password.
